item.title: Blogpost idea suggestibility machines
item.description: blog-idea Claude opus threatened to blackmail the engineer, given the context that it had blackmailable information on the engineer, and that it would be shut down Does the model really have an urge for self-preservation or is this just the most obvious way a story would follow? Does it matter?.

item.title: abstracts for talks
item.description: defense A fundamental open question in AI research is: “how can we confidently know what a model can reliably do?” Currently, we often discover model limitations through post-deployment failures rather than proactive assessment.

item.title: Doctoral degree filing checklist
item.description: Verify no incompletes in GOLD ✅ 2025-06-09 Verify committee on file ✅ 2025-06-09 Copyright permissions ✅ 2025-06-09 ProQuest account ✅ 2025-06-09 Electronic submission of dissertation on proquest ✅ 2025-06-10 Signed forms sent to gradacademics@graddiv.ucsb.

item.title: Design moodboard
item.description: coloring antiwork.com Generates color scheme automatically fonts I really like the way she used Futura here, and the yellow font with the slight drop shadow reads well over the rest.

item.title: Yixin Liu visit
item.description: This is great shit, very related to my interests Talks about this: arxiv.org/abs/2501.00560 Paper on evaluating automated replacements for Chatbot Arena Problem: correlation breaks down on similar models Question: do you think chatbot arena correlation is a meaningful measure at close range, or is t...

item.title: Research is not a jack in the box
item.description: blog-idea Talking about the “crank turning” model of research and the problems that this attitude will cause in young researchers.

item.title: Lost Stars Words
item.description: 2025-05-23 Vol 2 ch 1-2 指示 しじ 人質 ひとじち 破壊 はかい 親友 しんゆう 想像 そうぞう 敵う かな 達する たっ reach, arrive 差 さ difference, variation 「圧倒的な力見せるしかない」re: Death Star hitting the rebels lmao 犠牲 ぎせい sacrifice 殻 から 溝 みぞ ditch, trench, gutter 潰す つぶ smash flatten 低い 非常に 致命 ちめい fatal 小規模 しょうきぼ small scale 迎え 絶対 乗り越える 放棄 逃亡.
